snippet.title: Wall Jump Ninja - Atari 2600 Homebrew
snippet.description:
Wall Jump Ninja is an original homebrew game for your Atari 2600 published by http://AtariAge.com. 

As a ninja, you already have many skills. But there are many more to learn. Today you will learn the legendary technique of the "wall jump". Use it wisely, or face certain doom at the hands of the death beam.

To play, first adjust the difficulty switches to your liking. The Left difficulty switch toggles LAVA On/Off. When lava is off, you can use your teleport ability to zip back t o the top of the wall if you slide too low. The Right difficulty switch toggles HARD mode on On/Off. Hard mode makes spikes and other obstacles appear much sooner.

- Press FIRE to begin your training.
- Press FIRE to WALL JUMP. HOLD to jump higher.
- Avoid the Spikes.
- Collect N-I-N-J-A to use your Ninja Dash.
- Do not let the death beam hit you!

Jump through the room exits and achieve a new personal record!

You can learn more about Wall Jump Ninja by visiting the AtariAge Store: 

https://atariage.com/store/index.php?l=product_detail&p=1048
